{{Infobox battle item |name = Rusted Shield |image = [[File:Rusted Shield.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Rusted Shield''. |location =
*[[Energy Plant]] }} == Description == The '''Rusted Shield''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to Zamazenta. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 50%. ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Zamazenta (Battle Hero).png|40px]] Zamazenta (Battle Hero) || [[File:Zamazenta (Crowned Shield).png|40px]] Zamazenta (Crowned Shield) |} == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Energy Plant]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Zamazenta (Battle Hero) ''(Base 1/22.5 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} *Note: Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Rusted Shield to 1/15.
